description: UK based retailer specialising in premium shaving and grooming products from brands including Henson, Merkur, Muhle and Cyril R. Salter.

shipping.domestic: Royal Mail 24 or 48 hour tracked service. Free next day delivery on UK orders over £35.
shipping.international: Delivered Duty Unpaid. Competitive rates at checkout with Parcelforce, FedEx, UPS or DHL.
shipping.age_restricted_items: Straight razors or blades may require adult signature with FedEx, UPS or DHL.

returns_policy: 30 day returns on unused items with tags and original packaging. Opened or used grooming products can only be returned if defective.

products.name: Henson AL13 Safety Razor
features: Available in mild, medium and aggressive variants
Fits all standard double edge blades

products.name: Merkur 44C Safety Razor
features: Matte finish smooth black resin handle
Fits all standard double edge blades

products.name: Cyril R. Salter Shaving Creams
features: Suitable for all skin types including sensitive
Enriched with Aloe Vera, Glycerin and Vitamin E

products.name: Cyril R. Salter Tallow Shaving Soaps
features: Dome shaped pucks in 100ml and 70ml sizes
70ml size fits the Cyril R. Salter scuttle
A shaving brush is required to create the lather

faq.question: Do your safety razors fit standard double edge blades?
faq.answer: Yes. All double edge safety razors we sell fit standard DE blades unless stated otherwise.

faq.question: What delivery options do you offer in the UK?
faq.answer: Royal Mail tracked 24 or 48 hour services are available. Orders over £35 qualify for free next day delivery.

faq.question: What is your international shipping policy?
faq.answer: Orders ship Delivered Duty Unpaid with competitive rates shown at checkout. Duties and taxes may be payable on delivery.

faq.question: What is your returns policy?
faq.answer: You have 30 days to return unused items in original packaging. Opened or used grooming products may only be returned if defective.
